review:
My first visit to Ananya Dental Clinic  Arekere. I was a little apprehensive to visit due to covid, but once you enter one will be amazed to see the clinic being 100% sterile and safe with all the hygiene and sterilization protocols followed there .
Dr.DEEPA explained the procedure very patiently and carried out with utmost professionalism which made me very comfortable during the treatment. Doctor  is very professional and friendly. Highly recommend to Give a visitüôÇ !
Very good response from doctor with very much patience, i took root canal and caping. . I like timely response from doctor
